verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is my <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is my <S%H7272%H1916>footstool<s%>: where is the <S%H1004>house<s%> that ye <S%H1129>build<s%> unto me? and where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4496>rest<s%>?

For all those things hath mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>, and all those things have been, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: but to this man will I <S%H5027>look<s%>, even to him that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and of a <S%H5223>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and <S%H2730>trembleth<s%> at my <S%H1697>word<s%>.

He that <S%H7819>killeth<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> is as if he <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>; he that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>, as if he cut <S%H6202>off<s%> a <S%H3611>dog's<s%> <S%H6202>neck<s%>; he that <S%H5927>offereth<s%> an <S%H4503>oblation<s%>, as if he offered <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; he that <S%H2142>burneth<s%> <S%H3828>incense<s%>, as if he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> an <S%H205>idol<s%>. Yea, they have <S%H977>chosen<s%> their own <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in their <S%H8251>abominations<s%>.

I also will <S%H977>choose<s%> their <S%H8586>delusions<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H4035>fears<s%> upon them; because when I <S%H7121>called<s%>, none did <S%H6030>answer<s%>; when I <S%H1696>spake<s%>, they did not <S%H8085>hear<s%>: but they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H977>chose<s%> that in which I <S%H2654>delighted<s%> not.

Â¶ <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye that <S%H2730>tremble<s%> at his <S%H1697>word<s%>; Your <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> you, that cast you <S%H5077>out<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, <S%H559>said<s%>, Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>: but he shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> to your <S%H8057>joy<s%>, and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7588>noise<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%>, a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H7999>rendereth<s%> <S%H1576>recompence<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Before she <S%H2342>travailed<s%>, she brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>; before her <S%H2256>pain<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, she was <S%H4422>delivered<s%> of a man <S%H2145>child<s%>.

Who hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> such a thing? who hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> such things? Shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be made to bring <S%H2342>forth<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>? or shall a <S%H1471>nation<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> at <S%H6471>once<s%>? for as soon <S%H1571>as<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H2342>travailed<s%>, she brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> her <S%H1121>children<s%>.

Shall I bring to the <S%H7665>birth<s%>, and not cause to bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: shall <S%H589>I<s%> cause to bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>, and <S%H6113>shut<s%> the womb? <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> ye with <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and be <S%H1523>glad<s%> with her, all ye that <S%H157>love<s%> her: <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> for <S%H4885>joy<s%> with her, all ye that <S%H56>mourn<s%> for her:

That ye may <S%H3243>suck<s%>, and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of her <S%H8575>consolations<s%>; that ye may milk <S%H4711>out<s%>, and be <S%H6026>delighted<s%> with the <S%H2123>abundance<s%> of her <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H5186>extend<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to her like a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> like a <S%H7857>flowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream<s%>: then shall ye <S%H3243>suck<s%>, ye shall be <S%H5375>borne<s%> upon her <S%H6654>sides<s%>, and be <S%H8173>dandled<s%> upon her <S%H1290>knees<s%>.
As <S%H376>one<s%> whom his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5162>comforteth<s%>, so will I <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you; and ye shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And when ye <S%H7200>see<s%> this, your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H7797>rejoice<s%>, and your <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like an <S%H1877>herb<s%>: and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> toward his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H2194>indignation<s%> toward his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

For, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and with his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>, to <S%H7725>render<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2534>fury<s%>, and his <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> with <S%H3851>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

For by <S%H784>fire<s%> and by his <S%H2719>sword<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8199>plead<s%> with all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: and the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H7231>many<s%>.

They that <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> themselves, and <S%H2891>purify<s%> themselves in the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> tree in the <S%H8432>midst<s%>, <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and the <S%H8263>abomination<s%>, and the <S%H5909>mouse<s%>, shall be <S%H5486>consumed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For I know their <S%H4639>works<s%> and their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>: it shall <S%H935>come<s%>, that I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H3956>tongues<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> among them, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> those that <S%H6412>escape<s%> of them unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, <S%H6322>Pul<s%>, and <S%H3865>Lud<s%>, that <S%H4900>draw<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>, to <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>, and <S%H3120>Javan<s%>, to the <S%H339>isles<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, that have not <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H8088>fame<s%>, neither have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%>; and they shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>.

And they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> all your <S%H251>brethren<s%> for an <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and in <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and in <S%H6632>litters<s%>, and upon <S%H6505>mules<s%>, and upon swift <S%H3753>beasts<s%>, to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And I will also <S%H3947>take<s%> of them for <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For as the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%>, which I will <S%H6213>make<s%>, shall <S%H5975>remain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, so shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5975>remain<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that <S%H1767>from<s%> one new <S%H2320>moon<s%> to <S%H2320>another<s%>, and <S%H1767>from<s%> one <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to <S%H7676>another<s%>, shall all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H7200>look<s%> upon the <S%H6297>carcases<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: for their <S%H8438>worm<s%> shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>, neither shall their <S%H784>fire<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>; and they shall be an <S%H1860>abhorring<s%> unto all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
